'''Crispy Outside, Tender Inside''' is [[Xiangling]]'s Level 1 [[Constellation]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* This constellation also applies to some [[Wildlife]]. [[Forest Boar]]s in [[Serenitea Pot]]s also appear to have their Pyro RES reduced, although they cannot be killed.
